}}The armies of the Arab-Swahili states during the Congo Arab War emerged in 1892 during the Congo Arab War.The Arab-Swahili sultanates armies were characterised by Congolese soldiers commanded by Zanzibari officers
History
Organisation
The armies of the Arab-Swahili states combined had ~10,000 men.
